41 constexpr double PI = 3.14159265358979323846;
42 constexpr double TWOPI = 2.0 * PI;
43 constexpr double SQRT2 = 1.41421356237309504880;
45 
48 constexpr double NA = 6.0221415E23;
49 constexpr double KB = 1.3806503E-23;
50 constexpr double RU = NA * KB;
51 constexpr double HP = 6.626068E-34;
52 constexpr double MU0 = PI * 4.0E-7;
53 constexpr double C0 = 299792458.0;
54 constexpr double EPS0 = 1.0/(MU0*C0*C0);
55 constexpr double QE = 1.602176565E-19;
56 constexpr double ONEATM = 101325.0;
57 constexpr double SB = (2.0*PI*PI*PI*PI*PI*KB*KB*KB*KB)
58  / (15.0*HP*HP*HP*C0*C0);
